tool.name: CNVkit Target
tool.description: Prepare a BED file of baited regions for use with CNVkit.
tool.command: ln -s '$input_file' ./capture.bed && #if $annotate ln -s '$annotate' ./annotate.bed && #end if cnvkit.py target '$input_file' --output '$output_setting.output' #if $annotate --annotate ./annotate.bed #end if #if $short_names --short-names #end if #if $split --split #end if --avg-size $avg_size

param.name: annotate
param.label: Use gene models from this file to assign names to the target regions
param.help: Format: UCSC refFlat.txt or ensFlat.txt file (preferred), or BED, interval list, GFF, or similar

param.name: short_names
param.label: Reduce multi-accession bait labels to be short and consistent

param.name: split
param.label: Split large tiled intervals into smaller, consecutive targets

param.name: avg_size
param.label: Average size of split target bins
param.help: Results are approximate only use integers, don't use fractures
